title: Stop building Blue Ezreal
body: Blue Ezreal is a niche build path. You'll likely find more success with burst ezreal builds. If your team has a champion with tons of peel please don't be going blue. They'll be able to keep enemy champions off of you.

replies.body: Sorry this was made a year ago my comment is late. The point is that blue ezreal does no dmg compared to other adcs late game. He only has advantages against Melee champs cause infinite kiting with so much mana. But another add will wreck his face off. That's why I hate seeing blue ezreal on my team.
This was back when Blue Ezreal was garbo compared to his other builds.
Bro, what are you doing? This is year-old thread necro. Leave old threads dead.

Blue ezreal is good. Especially late game. In the end the build doesn't matter as much. What matters is the person who's playing ezreal. I've seen blue build even in high plat/low diamond games so you can't say it's not viable in ranked games.
You know, some people like the build because it's fun, not necessarily that they feel their team needs to give them more peel.

> You know, some people like the build because it's fun, not necessarily that they feel their team needs to give them more peel.

In ranked it's not about the fun, it's about the viability of the build path. If your team asks you not to build in that manner you shouldn't do it.
Some would argue Vel'Koz has no viable build path. Obviously you beg to differ. A few people's preconceived notions do not determine if a build (or champion) is viable.

Blue ezreal is good against comps that will dive him, or a comp that wants to get near him. If your team can keep the enemy away from him then a burst ezreal build is much more viable on the champion.
